name.ja: ドラゴニック・フォース

requirement.en: Shuffle 3 Dragon Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: This turn, 1 face-up monster on your field gains 900 ATK and your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when it declares an attack. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Dragonic Slayer" from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.
